name: benefaction
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the act of giving something, such as money, to help an organization, society, or person: Many of the artworks came to the museum through the benefaction of generous donors. The library is always grateful for the benefaction of supporters like you to keep its mission going.
[ C ] something that is given to help an organization, society, or person: The three paintings were a benefaction stipulated in the will of a wealthy patron. A generous benefaction from his uncle allowed him to attend college.
